verses.verse: What <S%G5101><s%> shall we say <S%G2046><s%> then? <S%G3767><s%> Shall we continue <S%G1961><s%> in sin, <S%G266><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> may abound? <S%G4121><s%>
May it never be! <S%G1096><s%> We <S%G2198><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> died <S%G599><s%> to sin, <S%G266><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> could we live <S%G2198><s%> in <S%G846><s%> it any longer? <S%G2089><s%>

Or don't <S%G50><s%> you know that <S%G3754><s%> all we who <S%G3754><s%> were baptized <S%G907><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> were baptized <S%G907><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> death? <S%G2288><s%>

We were buried <S%G4916><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> with him <S%G846><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> baptism <S%G908><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> death, <S%G2288><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> just like <S%G5618><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> was raised <S%G1453><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of the Father, <S%G3962><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> might walk <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> newness <S%G2538><s%> of life. <S%G2222><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> we have become <S%G1096><s%> united with <S%G4854><s%> him in the likeness <S%G3667><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> death, <S%G2288><s%> we will <S%G2071><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> be <S%G235><s%> part of his resurrection; <S%G386><s%>

knowing <S%G1097><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> old <S%G3820><s%> man <S%G444><s%> was crucified with <S%G4957><s%> him, <S%G2443><s%> that the body <S%G4983><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%> might be done away <S%G2673><s%> with, <S%G3588><s%> so that we <S%G2248><s%> would <S%G1398><s%> no <S%G3371><s%> longer be <S%G1398><s%> in bondage <S%G1398><s%> to sin. <S%G266><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> he who has died <S%G599><s%> has been freed <S%G1344><s%> from <S%G575><s%> sin. <S%G266><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> we died <S%G599><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> we believe <S%G4100><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we will <S%G4800><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> live with <S%G4800><s%> him; <S%G846><s%>

knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> being raised <S%G1453><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead, <S%G3498><s%> dies <S%G599><s%> no more. <S%G3765><s%> Death <S%G2288><s%> no more <S%G3765><s%> has <S%G2961><s%> dominion <S%G2961><s%> over him! <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the death that <S%G3739><s%> he died, <S%G599><s%> he died <S%G599><s%> to sin <S%G266><s%> one time; <S%G2178><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> the life that <S%G3739><s%> he lives, <S%G2198><s%> he lives <S%G2198><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>

Thus <S%G3779><s%> <S%G5210><s%> consider <S%G3049><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%> <S%G99999><s%> to sin, <S%G266><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> alive <S%G2198><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> don't <S%G3361><s%> let <S%G936><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> reign <S%G936><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> mortal <S%G2349><s%> body, <S%G4983><s%> that you should <S%G1519><s%> obey <S%G5219><s%> it <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> its <S%G846><s%> lusts. <S%G1939><s%>

Neither <S%G3366><s%> present <S%G3936><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> to sin <S%G266><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> instruments <S%G3696><s%> of unrighteousness, <S%G93><s%> but <S%G235><s%> present <S%G3936><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> to God, <S%G2316><s%> as alive <S%G2198><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead, <S%G3498><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> as instruments <S%G3696><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> will <S%G2961><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> have dominion over <S%G2961><s%> you. <S%G5216><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> you are <S%G2075><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> law, <S%G3551><s%> but <S%G235><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> grace. <S%G5485><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> then? <S%G3767><s%> Shall we sin, <S%G264><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> we are <S%G2070><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> law, <S%G3551><s%> but <S%G235><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> grace? <S%G5485><s%> May it never <S%G3361><s%> be! <S%G1096><s%>

Don't <S%G3756><s%> you <S%G1492><s%> know that <S%G3754><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> you present <S%G3936><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> as servants <S%G1401><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> obedience, <S%G5218><s%> his servants <S%G1401><s%> you are <S%G2075><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you obey; <S%G5219><s%> whether <S%G2273><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> death, <S%G2288><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> of obedience <S%G5218><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> righteousness? <S%G1343><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> thanks <S%G5485><s%> be to God, <S%G2316><s%> that, <S%G3754><s%> whereas you were <S%G2258><s%> bondservants <S%G1401><s%> of sin, <S%G266><s%> <S%G1161><s%> you became obedient <S%G5219><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the heart <S%G2588><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> that form <S%G5179><s%> of teaching <S%G1322><s%> whereunto <S%G3739><s%> you were delivered. <S%G3860><s%>
<S%G1161><s%> Being <S%G1659><s%> made free <S%G1659><s%> from <S%G575><s%> sin, <S%G266><s%> you became bondservants <S%G1402><s%> of righteousness. <S%G1343><s%>

I speak <S%G3004><s%> in human <S%G442><s%> terms because of <S%G1223><s%> the weakness <S%G769><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> flesh, <S%G4561><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> you presented <S%G3936><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> as servants <S%G1401><s%> to uncleanness <S%G167><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to wickedness <S%G458><s%> upon <S%G1519><s%> wickedness, <S%G458><s%> even so <S%G3779><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> present <S%G3936><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> members <S%G3196><s%> as servants <S%G1401><s%> to righteousness <S%G1343><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> sanctification. <S%G38><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> you were <S%G2258><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> of sin, <S%G266><s%> you were <S%G2258><s%> free <S%G1658><s%> in regard to righteousness. <S%G1343><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> did you <S%G2192><s%> have at that time in <S%G1909><s%> the things of which <S%G3739><s%> you are <S%G1870><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> ashamed? <S%G1870><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%> of those things <S%G1565><s%> is death. <S%G2288><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> now, <S%G3570><s%> being made free <S%G1659><s%> from <S%G575><s%> sin, <S%G266><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> having become servants <S%G1402><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> of <S%G1519><s%> sanctification, <S%G38><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> the result <S%G5056><s%> of eternal <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the wages <S%G3800><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%> is death, <S%G2288><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> the free gift <S%G5486><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
